title: 249: Bible Broads with Brianda
itunes:title: 249: Bible Broads with Brianda
description:
Today The Broads are having a #biblebroad episode with comedian/podcaster/christian, Brianda Agramonte! They chat about her podcast “Bible Stories with Brianda”, how she went from atheist to Christian, what her perspective is on the religion, being abstinent, masturbation, Christian Tiktok, nonmonogamy, Jesus, and a lot more! You are going to love her! 

BRIANDA:

Check out her podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bible-stories-with-brianda/id1557418795

Podcast Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgOrJlI0Iz7JCDfyz9y8fzA

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thatsbrianda/

Podcast Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/biblebrianda/

Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@biblebrianda?

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

STORYWORTH: Get $10 of your first purchase at STORYWORTH.COM/CHATTY

ADAM & EVE: Use code CHATTY and get TEN free gifts, 6 FREE movies, and free shipping!

FLEX FIT: Go to FLEXFITS.COM/CHATTY and use promo code CHATTY for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits or 10% off your first Flex Cup - PLUS free US shipping!

KIWI CO: Get 30% off your first month plus FREE shipping on ANY crate line with code CHATTY at KIWICO.COM

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/
